rules_text:
This creature enters with three +1/+1 counters and a reach counter.
When this creature dies, create an implant token and put it’s counters on it. [i](It’s a token artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery”)[/i]

OG_3:
Whenever MV4 Truffleyard Hog attacks, if there are three or more different kinds of counters among permanents you control, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn and can’t be blocked by more than one creature this turn.

OG_2:

OG_1:
